name: Captivate, Inc.
description: Captivate, Inc. is a leading provider of digital media solutions focused on enhancing audience engagement in public spaces. Founded in 2010, Captivate specializes in creating dynamic digital signage and interactive displays that cater to businesses looking to enhance communication and customer experiences. The company strives to bridge the gap between digital content and physical environments, offering solutions that include digital billboards, interactive kiosks, and customized content management systems. With a commitment to innovation, Captivate leverages cutting-edge technology and data analytics to deliver targeted messaging and engaging experiences that captivate audiences in retail, corporate, and transit environments. The company is dedicated to sustainability and aims to reduce the carbon footprint of its operations by utilizing energy-efficient technologies and promoting eco-friendly practices. Through its comprehensive suite of services, including content creation, hardware installation, and ongoing support, Captivate empowers businesses to connect with their customers in meaningful ways, thereby driving brand loyalty and increasing foot traffic.

seo.meta_title: Captivate, Inc. | Digital Media Solutions for Audience Engagement
seo.meta_description: Explore Captivate, Inc., a leader in digital media solutions that enhance audience engagement through innovative digital signage and interactive displays.

faq.answer: Captivate specializes in digital media solutions, including digital signage and interactive displays.

faq.answer: Captivate is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Captivate's main products include digital billboards, interactive displays, and custom content management solutions.
